forest.name: Sentinel Wood
forest.description: Earn one reputation star (1⭐) for each forest space (🌲) adjacent to the edge of the map.

forest.name: Greenbough
forest.description: Earn one reputation star (1⭐) for each row and column with at least one forest space (🌲). The same forest space (🌲) may be scored in a row and a column.

forest.name: Treetower
forest.description: Earn one reputation star (1⭐) for each forest space (🌲) surrounded on all four sides by filled spaces or the edge of the map.

forest.name: Stoneside Forest
forest.description: Earn three reputation stars (3⭐) for each mountain space (🗻) connected to another mountain space (🗻) by a cluster of forest spaces (🌲).

waterAndFarm.name: Canal Lake
waterAndFarm.description:
Earn one reputation star (1⭐) for each water space (💧) adjacent to at least one farm space (🌱).

Earn one reputation star (1⭐) for each farm space (🌱) adjacent to at least one water space (💧).

waterAndFarm.name: Mages Valley
waterAndFarm.description:
Earn two reputation stars (2⭐) for each water space (💧) adjacent to a mountain space (🗻).

Earn one reputation star (1⭐) for each farm space (🌱) adjacent to a mountain space.

waterAndFarm.name: The Golden Granary
waterAndFarm.description:
Earn one reputation star (1⭐) for each water space (💧) adjacent to a ruins space (🏛).

Earn three reputation stars (3⭐) for each farm space (🌱) on a ruins space (🏛).

waterAndFarm.name: Shoreside Expanse
waterAndFarm.description:
Earn three reputation stars (3⭐) for each cluster of farm spaces (🌱) not adjacent to a water space (💧) or the edge of the map.

Earn three reputation stars (3⭐) for each cluster of water spaces (💧) not adjacent to a farm space (🌱) or the edge of the map.

village.name: Wildholds
village.description: Earn eight reputation stars (8⭐) for each cluster of six or more village spaces (6+ 🏠).

village.name: Great City
village.description: Earn one reputation star (1⭐) for each village space (🏠) in the largest cluster of village spaces (>🏠) that is not adjacent to a mountain space (🚫🗻).

village.name: Greengold Plains
village.description: Earn three reputation stars (3⭐) for each cluster of village spaces (🏠) that is adjacent to three or more DIFFERENT terrain types (3+ 🌲🌱💧👾🗻).

village.name: Shieldgate
village.description: Earn two reputation stars (2⭐) for each village space (🏠) in the second largest cluster of village spaces (🏠❌ > 🏠✅).

space.name: Borderlands
space.description: Earn six reputation stars (6⭐) for each COMPLETE ROW (🔛) or COMPLETE COLUMN (🔝) of filled spaces.

space.name: Lost Barony
space.description: Earn three reputation stars (3⭐) for each space along one edge of the largest square (>❎) of filled spaces.

space.name: The Broken Road
space.description: Earn three reputation stars (3⭐) for each complete diagonal line (↘) of filled spaces that touches the LEFT (👈) and BOTTOM (👇) edges of the map (↘✅ | ↗❌).

space.name: The Cauldrons
space.description: Earn one reputation star (1⭐) for each empty space (🍃) surrounded on all four sides by filled spaces or the edge of the map.
